patterns.description: Use Tailwind @apply for repeated utility combinations in component-scoped CSS
examples: .btn-primary { @apply bg-blue-500 text-white px-4 py-2 rounded hover:bg-blue-600; }

patterns.description: Prefer Server Components by default, add 'use client' only when needed for interactivity
